ygData.subject: Re: MESH / NETTED ARMOUR
ygData.msgSnippet: mesh exists on a variety of froglogs in Guk.  but here i ll try and give list of where i ve seen the most... Tuk range from 15 to 18 imo, Gaz from 18 to 21,
ygData.messageBody:
mesh exists on a variety of froglogs in Guk. but here i'll try and give list
of where i've seen the most...

Tuk range from 15 to 18 imo, Gaz from 18 to 21, and Ton from 20 to 25.

Tuk Warriors - no mesh, rare woven
Tuk Shaman - no mesh, rare woven
Tuk Knight - no mesh, sometimes woven
Gaz Warriors - rare mesh, no woven
Gaz Shaman - rare mesh, no woven
Gaz Knights - rare mesh, no woven
Ton Warriors - rare mesh, no woven
Ton Shaman - sometimes mesh, no woven
Ton Knights - sometimes mesh, no woven
Shin/Vis/Etc... - sometimes mesh, no woven

hope that saves some of you some time :)

--- Derek Wilson <spider_x_@...> wrote:
> From: Derek Wilson <spider_x_@...>
>
> Do I have to live in the game just to get mesh or netted armour? I have been
> trying to find some ever since I got to level 8 (now I'm level 11) and still
> have not found anything other than a mesh collar (whoop te do) What's up
> with mesh? Why is there not enough of it? Must it be made or does it spawn
> on certain NPC's? I'm wondering why I never see any vendors carry any mesh
> items. Perhaps this is something I need to take up with Verant?
>
> Thanks,
> Derek Wilson
> aka Spider-X
>
> Linchao <Coalition of Fists>
